Package de.oth.blocklib

Class Game

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameWindow.ResizeListener
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameWindow.ResizeListener
This class defines the game loop and holds instances of every class. First initialize the world with initWorld() and then start the window with start(). Constructor with Configuration or without to get default configuration.
See Also:
Configuration

      public Game​(BlockLibProgram program, ContextType contextType, java.lang.Long seed)
      Creates and initializes a new game with default configuration.
      Parameters:
      program - Subclass of BlockLibProgram to run
      contextType - defining if this game is the server host, a client or the game should be single player
      See Also:
      Configuration
